summary: Testing completed for Prima Nota features: pagination, month filter, sync corrispettivi, POS as ENTRATA, and Invia Ordine button. All 16 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - all features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Prima Nota features fully tested. Key endpoints: GET /api/prima-nota/cassa?limit=2000, GET /api/prima-nota/banca?limit=2000, GET /api/prima-nota/stats, GET /api/prima-nota/corrispettivi-status, POST /api/prima-nota/sync-corrispettivi. Frontend data-testids: prima-nota-title, quick-entry-panel, filter-mese, tab-cassa, tab-banca, pos-data, pos1-importo, save-pos-btn, sync-corrispettivi-btn, send-order-btn

Prima Nota Pagination.details: 1070 movements displayed with 11 pages (100 items per page). Pagination controls working: ‚èÆÔ∏è ‚óÄÔ∏è Prec | 1 2 3 4 5 | Succ ‚ñ∂Ô∏è ‚è≠Ô∏è

Month Filter.details: Month selector dropdown with 24 months (Gen 2026 to Giu 2024). Filtering by Dec 2025 shows 81 cassa movements, 40 banca movements

Sync Corrispettivi.details: POST /api/prima-nota/sync-corrispettivi endpoint working. Status shows 347/353 synced, 6 pending. Corrispettivi appear as ENTRATE in Prima Nota Cassa

POS as ENTRATA in Cassa.details: POS Giornaliero panel saves to CASSA as ENTRATA (not Banca as uscita). Code verified in QuickEntryPanel.jsx lines 98-130

Invia Ordine Button.details: Green 'üì§ Invia Ordine (‚Ç¨XX.XX)' button visible in cart on Ricerca Prodotti page. Button has data-testid='send-order-btn' and green gradient background

api_endpoints_verified.GET /api/prima-nota/cassa?data_da=2025-1: ‚úÖ Month filter working - returns 81 movements for Dec 2025

frontend_components_verified.PrimaNota.jsx: ‚úÖ Pagination with 100 items/page, month selector, Cassa/Banca tabs, summary cards
frontend_components_verified.PrimaNotaMovementsTable.jsx: ‚úÖ Table with pagination controls, running balance column, edit/delete buttons
frontend_components_verified.QuickEntryPanel.jsx: ‚úÖ Corrispettivo, POS Giornaliero (ENTRATA in Cassa), Versamento, Movimento Cassa, Finanziamento Soci panels
frontend_components_verified.RicercaProdotti.jsx: ‚úÖ Product search, cart with supplier grouping, 'üì§ Invia Ordine' green button with data-testid
